name: DungeonOfTheSkeletons
description: There was a wizard  that uses his power to spread an infection that burns the flesh and blood of people turning them into skeletons. so our story is talking about a Prince and Princess that the wizard came to them and turn the prince into a skeleton and now he has to find the cure that will return him to his humanity by pathing through the creatures in the dungeon of the skeletons and find the cure.
